mapper.insert: insert into mail(sendAccount, sendEmail, advises, date, isReply) values(#{sendAccount}, #{sendEmail}, #{advises}, #{date}, #{isReply})
mapper.select: select sendAccount, sendEmail, advises, date, isReply from mail order by date desc limit #{size}, 10
mapper.update: update mail set isReply="1" where sendEmail=#{sendEmail}
